item.title: Hands on Bayesian Data Analysis
item.description: This is an introductory workshop on Bayesian Data Analysis aiming at undergrad students who in the near future may work as a researcher in the academia or industry. I will give an 1-hour overview on the difference between Bayesian and frequentist analysis methods, followed by a 2-hour hands-on session on analysing some simulated data. We will learn how to properly fit a line to data points. We will get to know that we have probably mis-understood some of the statistical concepts.
